text: Question 4 Consider routing table of an organization's router shown below: SubnetNumber | SubnetMask | NextHop 12.20.164.0 255.255.252.0 | R1 12.20.170.0 255.255.254.0 | R2 12.20.168.0 255.255.254.0 | Inter faceO 12.20.166.0 255.255.254.0 | Inter facel default R3 Which of the following prefixes in CIDR notation can be collectively used to correctly aggregate all of the subnets in the routing table? MSQ Q 12.20.164.0/20 e 12.20.164.0/22 0 12.20.164.0/21 @ 12.20.168.0/22 GATE CSE 2022 Computer Network
